main.title: Have fun with us
main.description: A comfortable computer club that helps you reboot. Here you can relax, enjoy the game and find your community.

about.title: About us
about.fanatIs: Is a network of computer and Sony Playstation halls distributed throughout the city of Bishkek. Since 2014, we have been proud to serve a wide audience of gamers and entertainment lovers.
about.ourMission: Create places where every gamer can find something that inspires and brings pleasure to them.

vacancies.title: Vacancies
vacancies.empty: There are no vacancies at the moment
